author: pipermerriam
content:
<@412614104222531604> I think we'd need to do some experiments to make this work but I think it's doable.  Few things come to mind:

- Likely some modifications we'd need to do on our end because much of what is in the clients is mainnet centric and my guess is that there'd be a few things that would need to be adjusted to make the clients network agnostic.
- Tiny networks of only a small number of nodes may behave weird.  Again, likely small client modifications necessary to make this work.
- Initializing data into those nodes would also probably need a little work.  

We have our weekly implementers call happening in 20 minutes.  Link will be announced in <#1331655016993394770> .  I'll add this as an agenda item for us to discuss.
